function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate protection from small particles and droplet nuclei","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases such as flu, chickenpox, and measles","Mitigation":"Use of FFP2 and FFP3 filtering masks, training programs, and distribution of appropriate masks","Technologies":"FFP2 and FFP3 filtering masks","People":"Doctors, nurses, biologists, midwives, healthcare personnel, staff of contracting firms, public assistance staff","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, contracting firms, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient supply of protective masks","Impact":"Inability to provide necessary protection to personnel and public, leading to increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Implementation of strategies for increasing supply, distribution plans, and utilization of alternative protective equipment","Technologies":"Supply chain management solutions, increased production capacity, utilization of alternative protective equipment","People":"Healthcare personnel, public assistance staff, contracting firms","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, contracting firms, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Imperfect protection provided by masks","Impact":"Misinterpretation of mask effectiveness and potential complacency in infection control measures","Mitigation":"Education and communication on the limitations of mask protection, reinforcement of other infection control measures","Technologies":"Educational materials, communication strategies","People":"Healthcare personnel, public assistance staff, contracting firms","Owner":"Public health organizations, training institutions"}]}
